alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 10:25AM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cortland, Chenango and Broome counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. *ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest accumulations will be at locations over 1,500 feet. The rain will change to snow from the hilltops down into the valleys this evening, with the highest snowfall rates; up to 1 inch per hour overnight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
